java -Xms4G -Xmx<MEM>G -jar run/MORecommenderSystem.jar SelectBest  <BD>/  BD/  features/<FOLD>/  MO/<FOLD>/  u.item.attributes  <hybrid>-<feature>.train  keys.train  "SOL-Ind-SUM;SOL-Ind-GeoRisk"  MO_    "1;2;3"                                            <RELEVANT>  10  LogarithmicDiscountModel  <CORES_MAIN>  <R1>  <R2>  <ALPHA>  "1;1;1"  > <OUT>decisionMaking_PEH-Ind_<FOLD>_<hybrid>-<feature>_<ALPHA>_R<R1>-<R2>.out
java -Xms4G -Xmx<MEM>G -jar run/MORecommenderSystem.jar SelectBest  <BD>/  BD/  features/<FOLD>/  MO/<FOLD>/  u.item.attributes  <hybrid>-<feature>.train  keys.train  "SOL-Ind-SUM;SOL-Ind-GeoRisk"  RISK_  "4:alpha=<ALPHA>;5:alpha=<ALPHA>;6:alpha=<ALPHA>"  <RELEVANT>  10  LogarithmicDiscountModel  <CORES_MAIN>  <R1>  <R2>  <ALPHA>  "1;1;1"  > <OUT>decisionMaking_RISK-Ind_<FOLD>_<hybrid>-<feature>_<ALPHA>_R<R1>-<R2>.out
java -Xms4G -Xmx<MEM>G -jar run/MORecommenderSystem.jar SelectBest  <BD>/  BD/  features/<FOLD>/  MO/<FOLD>/  u.item.attributes  <hybrid>-<feature>.train  keys.train  "SOL-Ind-SUM;SOL-Ind-GeoRisk"  FAIR_  "13;14;15"                                         <RELEVANT>  10  LogarithmicDiscountModel  <CORES_MAIN>  <R1>  <R2>  <ALPHA>  "1;1;1"  > <OUT>decisionMaking_FAIR-Ind_<FOLD>_<hybrid>-<feature>_<ALPHA>_R<R1>-<R2>.out
